author: iSazonov
body:
As discussed in #5158:
- Remove AddTypeCommandBase class.
- Minor code cleanups.
- Fix comments.

After the cleanups we can continue to improve Add-Type cmdlet.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @daxian-dbw @SteveL-MSFT Can we review and merge before RC? - it is formally breaking change.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Although technically a breaking change, I think the risk is low that we can take it after 6.0.0 rather than delay the RC

title: Remove AddTypeCommandBase class
